game.name: Yuki and Rina Football
game.description:
Yuki and Rina are the two most popular and highly talented soccer players. After seeing the amazing football skills of these two hardworking players, their manager and coach have decided to help them to be the Pro Players in the worldwide popular “Soccer Stars Major Football League”. For this reasons, it is important to go through the ultimate test where reflexes, skills and agility of the two players will be tested. Join Yuki and Rina Football game to help them to be called as the Pro Players!
Both two players have to run on the soccer field to be participated in this crucial football skill test. Try to help them run on the field as fast as possible carrying the ball while dribbling their opponents available on the ground! Do not forget to collect items and bonuses and jump over the dangerous obstacles in this free online sports game! Remember their successful training will allow them to unlock new and effective tricks, including amazing Flaming Shoes, Magic Gloves, Energy Drink and Mega Jump. 
We know you are skilled enough to raise the challenge by using the magic football tricks. Start rolling the ball and make Yuki and Rina feel proud on you! The entire crowd available on the playground is waiting for your hard efforts. Do let them down and assist them to be the Pro football players in your own style! You can compare your score with your friends and also grab medals and cups that can improve your squad. Make the player switch between lines by tapping a side! Good luck to all html5 soccer game lovers! Let the fun and thrill begin here with us!
